name: Comfort Hotel Stockholm

reviews.text: We stayed here for a Saturday night, seven of us travelling for a weekend away on a budget. The price of the hotel seemed very cheap, so we weren't expecting much, and were all very pleasantly surprised.
reviews.title: So much better than expected!
Nice hotel, convenient location
reviews.text: The rooms are small but clean and functional. The staff were very friendly, there's free internet in the reception area along with tea/coffee/biscuits 24/7 and the location is excellent - right by the central train and bus stations. The old town is close by, as is the Ice Bar and plenty of nice restaurants. Breakfast was served till 11 at the weekends, and was extremely good.

reviews.title: Central, clean, comfortable, simple
reviews.text: If you're looking for somewhere central, reasonably priced and don't intend to spend a long time in your room, I would highly recommend this hotel.

reviews.title: Tiny Tim
reviews.text: Very nice hotel. Got sort of an Ikea-style bedroom, with one bed against the window, and a 2nd bunk bed that folds down from the side wall. Very nice change from the usual cookie-cutter hotel room. Room was very clean and comfortable. Staff was very friendly. Hotel is near the Central Station (which has the airport express train) and is in a very convenient location. Got a great rate on hotels for one night, and then it jumped up $100 the next night. If I could get the lower rate every time, I'd stay at this hotel again in a heartbeat!

reviews.title: Very good, especially if you're traveling light!
reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights in January 2005. I found the ideal for somebody who needs a central, clean, modern, confortable and simple place to stay in Stockholm. The rooms are small, but contain all the things you need. The breakfast is included and is a full English Breakfast. Easy to get to from the airport as the Arlanda express stops under the hotel and the airport bus adjacent to the hotel. I would recommend it.

description: Hotel with single bedrooms; located in the World Trade Center, walking distance to the Central Station, shopping and restaurants.
